thread.title: BRIEF-Lululemon Athletica Says Agreed To Pay Laurent Potdevin Lump Sum Cash Payment Of $3.4 Mln As Soon As Practicable After Effective Date Of Separation

title: BRIEF-Lululemon Athletica Says Agreed To Pay Laurent Potdevin Lump Sum Cash Payment Of $3.4 Mln As Soon As Practicable After Effective Date Of Separation
text:
#Market News  17 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Lululemon Athletica Says Agreed To Pay Laurent Potdevin Lump Sum Cash Payment Of $3.4 Mln As Soon As Practicable After Effective Date Of Separation Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Lululemon Athletica Inc: 
* LULULEMON ATHLETICA - AGREED TO PAY LAURENT POTDEVIN LUMP SUM CASH PAYMENT OF $3.4 MILLION AS SOON AS PRACTICABLE AFTER EFFECTIVE DATE OF SEPARATION 
* LULULEMON ATHLETICA INC - POTDEVIN WILL NOT RECEIVE ANY CONTINUED OR ACCELERATED VESTING OF ANY OUTSTANDING EQUITY AWARDS 
* LULULEMON - IN CONNECTION WITH POTDEVINâ€™S RESIGNATION, CO TO MAKE CASH PAYMENT $1.65 MILLION TO BE PAID OVER A PERIOD OF 18 MONTHS Source text: [ bit.ly/2EjTwbl ]
